messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Firing Range.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Solar Array.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Space Station 13, we have reported unusual energy readings in your area.

Please send a message detailing the reasons for this.

Due to this, we will be unable to supply a shuttle for the time being.

We apologise for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Please note: Our emergency shuttle evacuation team has failed to report in.

Please attempt to communicate with them.
